DOC.brief_summary: To perform extensive analysis data Dietary Intervention Study Hypertension ( DISH ) ..
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : DISH multicenter , control , randomize study conduct 1980-1983 496 patient , formerly participant Hypertension Detection Follow-up Program blood pressure well control medication . At DISH baseline randomize continue medication withdrawn antihypertensive medication determine weight reduction sodium restriction/potassium increase intervention could maintain people blood pressure control without drug . Only main finding regard diastolic blood pressure control different diet regimen , analyze report course DISH funding . Many question could uniquely addressed comprehensive data base remain unexplored . They also analyze mortality experience cohort five year post DISH relation DISH randomization group relation success remain drug DISH . They query National Death Index determine DISH participant die follow termination DISH .
